channel.title: My 'Click to Participate'
channel.description:
Ok, in that other post. I just threw away what I was using in my 'PHP/MySQL HELP!?' thread.
This next one I had to write up by myself. Although, I did use SOME little snippets off of Kplop's post in the 'PHP/MySQL HELP!?' thread.
[center][url=http://www.theribbons.org/index.php]TheRibbons.org[/url][/center]
Yes, I know. It needs A LOT of work.
Well, maybe not a lot. But a bit.
EDIT;; Also, I noticed that the reCAPTCHA doesn't work that well. For some odd reason you can still get 1 - 3 letters/numbers wrong and still it gets accepted. This one won'e be on much longer, I can't allow it. Because if anyeone wants to null the database, it would be really easy. I'm taking a few steps to taking care of that.

item.title: My 'Click to Participate'
item.dc:creator: @Kollidierende Kolli`
item.description:
@Kollidierende wrote:

Yeah, I was in a hurry with it.

And, you can easily null the database.
I have to fix that too.

I added in the reCAPTCHA to reduce some spam (:

Read full topic

item.description:
@Kollidierende wrote:

Ok, in that other post.
I just threw away what I was using in my ‘PHP/MySQL HELP!?’ thread.

This next one I had to write up by myself. Although, I did use SOME little snippets off of Kplop’s post in the ‘PHP/MySQL HELP!?’ thread.

[center]TheRibbons.org[/center]

Yes, I know.
It needs A LOT of work.

Well, maybe not a lot. But a bit.

EDIT;;
Also, I noticed that the reCAPTCHA doesn’t work that well. For some odd reason you can still get 1 - 3 letters/numbers wrong and still it gets accepted. This one won’e be on much longer, I can’t allow it. Because if anyeone wants to null the database, it would be really easy.
I’m taking a few steps to taking care of that.
